title: President congratulates Pakistan cricket team on test innings victory
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 10 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi Monday congratulated the Pakistan Cricket Team on their innings victory in the Rawalpindi Test match against Bangladesh.
The president also felicitated Naseem Shah on being the youngest bowler in the history of the test cricket to have a hat-trick.
He also wished good luck for Bangladesh team in the future.
